name: Baby Care Games
description:
In this adorable Baby Care Games you will be able to dress a baby, let the beautiful and elegant, you will show that you know well be responsible.
Be a good mom and take care of your newborn baby. Just dress up the baby in these games

Features:
* Simple to play for boys and girls.
* All colors and sizes for Baby Care.
* Fun music.
* Take photo of baby.
* Discover dress up games free.
* You can share on Facebook.
* Comment on how much you love Baby Care.

Play with children in our game take care of baby !!!
These games will test your babysitting skills as you take care baby...
